org.spleen.config

Class SpleenConfigurator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.spleen.config.SpleenConfigurator

  • public class SpleenConfigurator
extends java.lang.Object
    Spleen configuration class. The spleen configuration is used by the created namespace to define the cache limits and the schedules.
    Author:
    vallance

    • Constructor Detail

      • SpleenConfigurator

        public SpleenConfigurator()
        Default constructor. Default configuration constructor. Set removerSheduleTime to 5 milliseconds, cacheTimeout to 1 second, maxSize to 1 megaBit.

      • SpleenConfigurator

        public SpleenConfigurator(long removerSheduleTime,
                  long cacheTimeout,
                  double maxSize,
                  int maxCount)
        Spleen configuration constructor. Spleen complete constructor.
        Parameters:
        removerSheduleTime - The schedule time for the deletion search of the CacheOutRemover thread.
        cacheTimeout - The cache time range of the CacheObjects.
        maxSize - The max bit size of the NamespaceMap stored objects.
        maxCount - The max count of the NamespaceMap stored objects.

    • Method Detail

      • getRemoverSheduleTime

        public long getRemoverSheduleTime()
        Get the removerSheduleTime. Return the schedule time for the deletion search of the CacheOutRemover thread
        Returns:
        The schedule time.

      • setRemoverSheduleTime

        public void setRemoverSheduleTime(long removerSheduleTime)
        Set up the removerSheduleTime. Set up the schedule time for the deletion search of the CacheOutRemover thread
        Parameters:
        removerSheduleTime - The new time for the deletion search schedule.

      • getCacheTimeout

        public long getCacheTimeout()
        Get the cacheTimeout. Get the cache time range of the CacheObjects.
        Returns:
        The cache time range of the CacheObjects.

      • setCacheTimeout

        Set up the cacheTimeout. Set up the cache time range of the CacheObjects.
        Parameters:
        cacheTimeout - The new time range.

      • getMaxSize
